affiliates.title: Affiliates Program
affiliates.pageDescription: Partner with JobMatch AI, share with your network, and earn commissions!
affiliates.detailsDesc: Use this code or link to promote JobMatch AI.
affiliates.performanceDesc: Track your clicks, signups, and earnings.
affiliates.noSignups: No signups through your affiliate link yet.
affiliates.commissionProcessNote: Commissions are typically processed at the end of each month.

howItWorks.title: Share Your Link
howItWorks.description: Distribute your unique referral link through social media, email, or your website.

howItWorks.title: New User Signs Up
howItWorks.description: A new user signs up on JobMatch AI through your unique referral link.

howItWorks.title: Earn Commission
howItWorks.description: You earn a commission for qualifying purchases or subscriptions made by your referred user.

howItWorks.title: Get Paid
howItWorks.description: Track your earnings and receive payouts, typically on a monthly basis.
